alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Miami-Dade County through 545 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Royal Palm Ranger, or 9 miles southwest of Homestead, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florida City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County
